name: trending_with_pagination
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool top_nft_collections.
Tool description: Provides up-to-date information on the top NFT collections across various networks, including Ethereum, BNB Chain, Polygon, Arbitrum, Optimism, and Solana.
API description: Fetches trending NFT collections from OpenSea with pagination support.

limit.description: The number of collections to fetch. Default is 50.

offset.description: The number of collections to skip before starting to fetch. Default is 0.
